name: Sumo Simulator (irishLum)
description:
Somehow, behind everyone's backs, Ohio has taken over the world. Is it simply that the world was too pre-occupied with more "important" matters? Whatever the cause, the all of humanity is under a single oppressive rule. One dreary night, a hungry humble sumo decides to do something about it...

Play as Sumo the Hump as you carefully platform through 5 levels, with a mix of hand-crafted challenges, and randomly-arranged puzzle rooms! Go for the high score, or just see if you can make it to the final boss!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys - Move/crouch/grab/eat

Z - Jump

X - Attack/throw
